content.detailedDescription:
I was working on road construction 30 some miles north of ft briger wy.
i had to check water pumps that ran 24hr a day. it was a cool summer night and a starry night. i went out with to check my water pump. after checking my pump i got in my pickup and having two friends with me headed further down the road a mile or two , turned around to head home. and there in the middle of the dirt road where you just came from was a decapitated sheep sitting rigid like a teddy bear. i pulled up about 10ft from the sheep so my headlight shined on it. and turned off my pickup. i tried to get the others with me to get out and look at it but they were to scared. when i got out i looked for track ( foot or tire tracks ). i thought someone was playing a trick on us . but when i started looking at this i realized. no one from this world could do this. i was first looking at a sheep that was rigid, in a sitting position back and front leg straight in front of it (reminded my of a teddy bear. nothing gone but the head. when i got close enough i noticed there was steam come from the wound. and the wound itself look like red glass... no burnt fleece no blood on the fleece. i tried to get the others to help me load it in my pickup ,they wouldn't. by this time i getting a little scared myself. i got back in my truck and went to start it ... it just clicked than i lost my lights to i cant remember how i wanted but it seemed forever. it finally started and we went straight back. we told some guys about. they went out but could find anything.

     this took place in 1980. knowing what a laser can do that had to be what they used to remove the head but as for this sheep being rigid and in the position it was left in...?
content.summary: Found a decapitated sheep on a dirt road

content.detailedDescription: We were young and had been playing basketball and i was sitting on the curb and my friend in the street. he noticed the object and flew down the mountain at tree level to the river and then lights came on flew over the river slow and the lights went off. the object flew fast after being over the river back over the mountain. the date is rough estimate it was said then that other people had also seen it and was weather satellite. not likley lol :)
content.summary: We were young and been playing basketball & i was sitting on the curb and my friend in the street. he noticed the object and flew down the mountain at tree level to the river and then lights came on flew over the river slow and the lights went off

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling withe a friend from high school to see his father in stites idaho. i am not sure exactly where we were when we sighted this but later found out it was sighted as far south as i believe texas and was reported all the way north through idaho. the said it must have crashed in northern idaho or canada. they never reported finding it. in my 61 years i have never seen the likes. a silver looking object kinda like a plane without windows, wings, or a tail that was moving north as obseved from the west of it was on fire leaving a dark smoke trail but looking like it was traveling at near jet speeds. it kept altitude and went right to left and was observed by us for 25 to 30○ of range of sight. it was going north and didn't seem to be losing altitude. many sightings were reported from several states but ended in upper middle idaho. in fact i don't remember any sightings i coer d' lene only they were tracking through radar and lost it high idaho or canada. never found crash as far as i know. would love to know what happened. expected it to blow up at any second but it kept on going seeming not to be affected by the fire engulfing the front third of the cigar shaped cylinder.  it was the most exciting thing i ever saw. my buddy only got glimpses of it since he was driving but he saw it too. we both thought we would have learned that it crashed but they must have covered it up or it never crashed. the flames were readily visible engulfing the front ofbthe object but it kept altitude and kept speeding north. mystery tha many people witnessed that day from texas to northern idaho.  help me out was it ever found?
content.summary: We saw what looked like a silver cigar shaped object with the front 1/3 engulfed in bright orage/yellow flames

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling withe a friend from high school to see his father in stites idaho. i am not sure exactly where we were when we sighted this but later found out it was sighted as far south as i believe texas and was reported all the way north through idaho. the said it must have crashed in northern idaho or canada. they never reported finding it. in my 61 years i have never seen the likes. a silver looking object kinda like a plane without windows, wings, or a tail that was moving north as obseved from the west of it was on fire leaving a dark smoke trail but looking like it was traveling at near jet speeds. it kept altitude and went right to left and was observed by us for 25 to 30�› of range of sight. it was going north and didn't seem to be losing altitude. many sightings were reported from several states but ended in upper middle idaho. in fact i don't remember any sightings i coer d' lene only they were tracking through radar and lost it high idaho or canada. never found crash as far as i know. would love to know what happened. expected it to blow up at any second but it kept on going seeming not to be affected by the fire engulfing the front third of the cigar shaped cylinder.  it was the most exciting thing i ever saw. my buddy only got glimpses of it since he was driving but he saw it too. we both thought we would have learned that it crashed but they must have covered it up or it never crashed. the flames were readily visible engulfing the front ofbthe object but it kept altitude and kept speeding north. mystery tha many people witnessed that day from texas to northern idaho.  help me out was it ever found?
content.summary: We saw what looked like a silver cigar shaped object with the front 1/3 engulfed in bright orage/yellow flames

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i was coming from listening to live music from a bar inside of a complex. as we were leaving the complex we needed to make a left turn to get out. when my husband looked to the right he realized that there were strange lights in the sky. he wanted to find out what the strange lights were so we turned right and pulled over to see what was going on and that's when i started filming. i automatically thought that they were ufo's because they started off at somewhere around 15 or 20 lights and than some began to fade away into thin air while three objects made a triangular shape. than it seemed like all the lights disappeared but when i looked at the video again i realized that even though the lights could no longer be seen with the naked eye they were still showing up in the video. it appeared at if the lights were just hovering before disappearing and changing shape. i always knew that we weren't alone i was just shocked because i never thought that i would see an unknown object. after it seems like the objects disappeared a helicopter came immediately afterward and began to encircle the area of where the objects were seen. we left the area but as we were driving home we could still see the helicopter searching the area, and the helicopter didn't make any noise. if you weren't looking up you would have missed the whole thing.
content.summary: It appeared as twenty lights and some disappear while another went to a triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1967 my girlfriend (now my wife) were students attending eastern new mexico university located in the city of portales, new mexico. we were at a fraternity party being held in a farm building located on a deserted county road about 8 miles from the city in the middle of flat farmland with no lights or houses within miles.  there were about 40 people at the party, loud music and lots of noise.
   after we had been there for about two hours my girl friend and i went outside to my car, which was parked outside close to the building, to get some fresh air. we were looking up to the sky which was perfectly clear, lots of stars, no haze or clouds from horizon to horizon. i was looking in a southerly direction where i noticed a very large dark oval shaped object blocking the starlighted night sky.  my first thought thought was that it was a cloud.  we continued to look at the sky for quite some time (20 or 30 minutes) and saw that the object had not moved from its original location. i told my girl friend that this was strange since clouds move across the sky and change shape. i looked all the way around to see if there were any clouds or any aircraft in the sky and there were none.  i began to look closely at the object.  we were looking up at the object at a 45 degree angle. it was very large at least 500 to 600 feet across.  it was stationary at a height of 2000 or 3000 feet, 4 or 5 miles away in a southerly direction from us.  we continued observing the object which remained stationary, with no lights or sounds. the object had a definite oval shape. the object did not have a clearly defined sharp edge, rather, it had a fuzzy edge that blended into the night sky. after observing the object for a while longer, i noticed three or four small round shaped objects slowly fly out and away a distance from the large object.  after a while, the small objects would fly back into the large object, and others would fly out and back into the oval object.  the small objects also blocked out the starlighted sky and had fuzzy edges that blended into the night sky.  we observed the objects for about an hour until we we decided to rejoin the party.  about 2 hours later, the party was over.  when we left and the objects were no longer visible.
   we never told or reported the incident to anyone for fear of being rediculed.
content.summary: We observed a very large oval shaped stationary object, with smaller round objects that appeared  to fly out and back into the large object. the objects were had mass as they blocked out the starlighted  sky.

content.detailedDescription: 6/25/2015 11:30 am pst..Driving thru carbon canyon in chino hills california object appears in the sky..It's base the shape of an airplane. its wings are ridged.Some pointing up..Some down.Its flying sideways..Hovers..Then starts moving..No windows..One circle shaped light. it starts changing colors its base sky/baby blue.Its ridged edges were a transparent white.It starts to appear transparent in color. and it was changing shapes as well..More ridged. the way paper looks when its crumbled..Thats the shape it started to take on. an actual aiplane flying in its direction. the airplane must have seen it because it changed it's course. the object disappeared. 11:55 am..In chino..And low and behold a military chopper flying towards carbon canyon. that was absolutely not a man made object!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Transparent morphing ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back patio having coffee at 7:30am jun 21 fathers day i was just looking up at the sky relaxing and i see that oval white but transparent shape again but it had two more trailing it this time.Then all three of them just blended in with the blue sky .There was no cloud cover that morning so strange yet again.There is something going on in jupiter florida.
content.summary: I was having my coffee in my usual place on my back patio and here again are three ufos trailing one another this is the fifth time i have seen this .What is going on ?

content.detailedDescription: I came out of the front door of my house around 9pm. i observed two small airplanes in the night sky, one to the north and one to the south. the night sky was cloudless. then almost immediately i observed a bright,glowing object/light in front of me coming from the west. it seemed rectangular in shape and was reddish orange like a fireplace ember. my sense was that it was higher than a local plane but not near as high as the san francisco jetliners that pass overhead. within 2 seconds, i saw a small reddish orange light or fragment come off from the object/light and fall earthward. the object/light continued toward my direction, heading eastward, at a steady speed. as it came toward me my sense was that it was now much higher in the sky than when i first saw it. when it was directly overhead, it just vanished. this observation lasted about 12 seconds. there was no noise associated with this event.
content.summary: Observed an unusual glowing reddish orange light at night coming from the west and disappearing when over head.

content.detailedDescription: On a trip to the great wall. a friend took my picture, i just happen to notice in it there is a object in the frame i had not noticed before.
content.summary: Just noticed it in a picture

content.detailedDescription: Me and and my sister were outside and seen some blinking light to the east, so we watched the sky for awhile.  my sister looked to the north and seen a triangle shaped object flying (seemed like it was gliding) and pointed it out to me, i seen the object, all lights really bright and the outline of the object can be seen, was a very large (300 ft) or so. it was probably around a mile or 2 high. planes can be seen at a hight of 30,000 feet also heading towards the east, so the plane was a lot higher than the object, the object was heading from north to south. my sister and i looked at the object for about  10 seconds and then i ran inside the house to get my brother and  ran back out but then  it disappeared.  it felt surreal to see it, my sister was scared but it seemed just like watching a movie, it was a clear night and the object was easily visible. my sister thought it was a flock of geese flying in formation at first but as it came closer, it was clear it was a ufo.
content.summary: Triangle shaped with white lights on the edges, dark, size of a football stadium

content.detailedDescription: Craft  first  one was a train gle  type  craft  the other was a cyclinder type silver in color  one crashed in  delta in flames i could state more  but my computer is acting up i got a picture of one of them but traded my camera phone for a joint  of weed the guys name was daneil  he was  a nice man  but i wantedi traded  it to get high to get high so  help me my compter is on the fritz
content.summary: cyclinder silver in color straight up in to space

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in my boyfriend's car talking.  we looked up through the front window and above the car was a hovering spaceship like you see in movies.  it was very large with lights blinking in white then red and green.  a minute after we saw it we were just about to leave because we were afraid.  then it just went from where we were to way out over the city in a second. even though the government had radar installation sights on the lake.  no sound no fumes.  just from point a to point b. there is no way it could have been anything that our government had made. when we arrived at my boyfriend's parent's house we were going to tell them about what we saw and his mother saw the same thing in the sky above her home on milwaukee avenue, which is directly west of montrose harbor.  others reported on the radio that night seeing a ufo that night.
content.summary: 1962 dome-shaped disk hovered over car at montrose harbor blinking lights white turned green and red then ship went from where it hovered to far out in the lake in a second

content.detailedDescription: It was a icy cold night about 4 a.M.,i was staying the night at my mom's house on the couch ..Saw this ufo over a neighbors house across the street hovering over a tree with a light shining on it moving the branches waveing like wind blowing,thier was no wind that night .It was their for 2-3 minutes hen slowly moved to the cloud bank.Did not say nothing for 4 years.Talking one of the neighbors on the other block right behined the house .I brought it up and he say the same thing..He has passed ,i just need to tell this before i pass someday.
content.summary: Bent cigar shaped red lights on end one white ligt in center two green by the white light

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside on nice clear night after thanksgiving. first noticed searchlights that did not go out but reflected back the lights were alternating but as a continuous circle.Silent. and in a very localized fog on a very clear night. i am trained observer. so, curiosity and gathering observations . i did not feel any different after.

the gone was just gone. i was at the top of the driveway and it was semi level with it.

i went to the dod site and sent an email to ask if it is theirs but  no response to that
content.summary: First noticed search lights that did not go ouit but reflected back and localized fog

content.detailedDescription: During that evening i was trying to make a pyramid to scale by looking in an encyclopedia to get the right measurements, all of a sudden i got really bad acid indigestion so i got up off the floor in the front room to go into the bathroom to get some bromo seltzer. i walked from the front room into the den where we have a sliding glass door and at the top left hand corner there was a light shining through the curtains, it startled me and i just stood there for about 15 seconds wondering what it was. i thought it was probably a light from the next street over but i was to scared to pull open the curtains and i just went into the kitchen and then into the bathroom to get the bromo seltzer, i stepped back into the kitchen to get some water for the bromo, i drank it and walked back into the den to see if the light was still there and it was gone so i opened the curtains to see what it might have been and that is when i knew it was a probe, because, from the angle where i was standing in the den to where i saw the light, there was no way it could have been from the other street,because we had a patio roof that extended 15 feet from right above the sliding glass door and at that angle (45 degrees) i would have been looking right at the patio roof 2 feet away. there was no way at all it was a light from the next street or the neighbors that live behind us it had to be right outside the window. i never finished the pyramid.
content.summary: I saw a light shining through our curtians

content.detailedDescription: While out deer hunting and alone i observed this light bouncing in a downward path before it disappeared behind a hill. this incident occurred near camel mountain in snohomish county. i've yet to undrestand what it was. i noticed this light--it looked like a sparkler(the firewoks type)--as i looked in the direction it appeared. not knowing who or where to report this incident i just forgot about it.I thought it was a strange object and a ufo.
content.summary: I observed a sparkling light bouncing in a downward path disappearing behind a hill.

content.detailedDescription: Was out on my back patio with friends when we noticed a bright object flashing lights and moving slowly accross the sky, almost directly above us. it was daytime so we assumed it was balloons reflecting light from the sun. but the lights were intensely bright, red, green and white, so we thought it could be a blimp or drone. so i grab my binoculars for a closer look. i was so impressed with what i saw, it was incredible! a donut shaped object. clearly a donut. it was rotating, spinning, flashing its lights on the outer edge as well as inside the shape. i could clearly see through the center of the object. it was charcoal colored. and the lights, and movement were impressive. watched it rotate and flash until it was lost behind other buildings. incredible.
content.summary: Donut shaped object, bright lights, rotating above studio city, daytime

content.detailedDescription: I was in a parking lot. initially it appeared there was a really bright star in the morning sky, venus possibly. i found out how wrong i was though, when as the object moved closer i was able to make out not one but two objects, wich sort of "floated" in a path heading from north north east, to the west/southwest. once these objects were overhead for some reason, i felt really afraid. and being a former combat medic, i don't scare easily.  how did i feel, well initially i felt basically, oh that's a really bright star. but once i was looking directly at the bottom of the things, i was a little confused. because of a few things. one i had no memory of getting out of my car, and really had no reason to do so. as i was there to pick someone up from work. and two, i suddenly noticed a woman also standing there with me looking up at the thing. yet i didn't see her walk up to my car, didn't see her get out of her car or well don't remember seeing her doing so, and she expressed confusion to me, as to how she'd even gotten there. as she said she had no memory of driving there, getting out of her car, or walking over and up to mine. it was lit, just one second i was alone, and the next i wasn't. i've always been a skeptic when it came to the issues of u.F.O.'s but after seeing this, well not so much anymore. and i"m hoping that someone here at mufon, will be able to tell me what it was that i saw, and why i can't remember this woman coming upt o my car, getting out of my car, or remember actually seeing the craft close the distance. as it was at first in the distance, then suddenly, directly overhead, perhaps 50-100 feet above the roofline of the two story building i was besides.
content.features: Patterned Surface, Insignia, Appendage(s), Other, Unknown
content.summary: Two triangles, dark grey/black in color, with orange lights at the "points" and one in the middle of the thing i saw

content.detailedDescription: I was 4 years old and i found myself in deep forest i must have walked in my sleep and next thing i was standing next to a stream trees on both sides and very dark but for the stars off the water. then a round shadow and then the bright light with a warm feeling hit me and next thing i was standing next to the old house i went inside and lay on the floor and fell asleep. the next time was when i was 12 years old. and one at 68 years old i never would want to tell others because they might think i'm crazy!!! thank you
content.summary: Disc and lot of light

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed a large black object moving slowly in the afternoon sky from my 2nd story balcony.  it was a black roundish object but looked to have a rear section with rough edges. (like a geometrical sphere)  
i went inside and grabbed my monocular scope and came back out.  the object was 15-20 miles away.  i looked at it still moving slowly, held the scope up to my eye and couldnt find it so i lowered the scope to get a better aim but the object was gone.  plenty of sky in all directions from my view point and no sign of it.  i have also seen reports of black pnjects in sky during broad daylight.
content.summary: From my 2nd story balcony i saw a black object, spherical but rough rear edges floating slowly, took my monocular scope out and by the time i put it to my eye the object was completely gone.  seemed to move a little slower than a plane at that distance

content.detailedDescription: Just got off work it was 0015 was coming to a small creek and saw some lights   i stop mt truck rolled down my window and watch it come over me it then stop the lights underneath were about 3 foot wide there were 5 or 6 lights going down two sides and the back forming a triange it was a treetop it then went towards river  i started going towards hopewell then at the river i saw it again i could see a dome on top of it
content.summary: Just got off work was at creek it came over top of my truck i stop it stop then went on

content.detailedDescription:
In my house.

that bright bluish light.

a helicopter.

all it did was move around in my backyard,
like it was looking for something.
and did this several times.

went to the kitchen window. i was scared.

it took off after about 30 minutes or so.
content.summary: A bright white bluish light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was vacationing with a friend at the outer banks, nc.  we spent spent the day on ocracoke island.  returning to hatteras on the ferry that evening (dusk), a sudden light appeared in the sky over the water ahead.  then, a second light, and a third.  then, all at once, they went out.  again, just a few yards ahead (to the south), the lights appeared again, one at a time - bling, bling, bling.  then out, all at once.  this happened a third time, again moving forward a few yards, then a fourth.  this time, instead of all going out at one time, all the lights began to spin to the left, giving the sense that they were attached to a very large circular/disc shaped object (as the sky was getting dark, it was hard to see much beyond the lights themselves).  spinning, the lights became a blur.  then they streaked off to the north and vanished within a few hundred yards.  i have poor depth perception, but i would say this object was fairly low to the water for a flying craft -- maybe equal to the height of a 3 to 5-story building.  the lights were round, glowing bright orange, and had to be several feet across to be as visible as they were from the ground.  the overall object was not really visible in the dark.  as i said, i did feel the lights were attached to something dark and round, as the eventual spinning before shooting off created a blurred path, with the lights disappearing as they spun to the far side of the craft, then appearing again as they came around to the front.

the ferry was packed with all the passengers standing along the rails or near their cars.  i remember feeling frozen -- had my camera around my neck, but was so in awe of the sight, that i couldn't look away to take a picture.  the entire group just stared silently, accept a man standing in front of me.  he said, "are we seeing what i think we're seeing?"  i responded with, "i can't think of any other explanation."  he and i exchanged some "holy cows", but no one else made a sound or even looked away.  i made a few comments to my friend, but she never responded.  on the car ride back up the island to avon (where we were staying) i couldn't stop talking about it to the friend that was with me.  she never really said much -- i assumed that she was still in shock.  but, years later, i brought this event up to her.  her response shocked me.  she told me that she remembers me mentioning the event from time to time, but she doesn't remember being there.  she insists it must have happened another time.  well, i've only been to the outer banks once - there was no other time.  i know it was not a dream and have to believe that she has just blocked it out.  as so many on the ferry remained silent and motionless, i've often wondered if the man i talked to and myself were among a very few that were aware of what we were seeing.  

note: under "number of objects observed", i checked both 1 and 3.  i definitely saw 3 round lights, and only speculate that they were attached to 1 large craft.  number of witness is estimated.
i am reporting this now, as this sighting just keeps getting stronger in my mind.  i am curious to know if any others on that ferry reported this event.
content.summary: Orange globe lights flashed on 1-2-3, then went out all at once.  repeated 3 times, 3rd time, the large disc began spinning then took off, leaving an orange trail.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a break from painting my interior portions of my home.  i was sitting on my back steps of my home.  it was approximately 0200 to 0230 hrs., i worked the midnight shift, and this was one of my days off.  i was sitting for about 10 minutes and i felt a presence, so i stood up and turned and faced north.  looking up, i observed a dark triangle object moving slow and steady from east to west just above treetop level.  the object made no sound, nor produced any light.  the triangle was a silhouette against the clear moonless night at that time -- june of 1987.  i was neither alarmed or scared - as i knew what i had just observed.  i was excited, but i did not contact anyone or tell anyone until my wife came home from work at 0610 hrs.

we both worked midnights at the local correctional facilities.  she came home and informed me that the alert response vehicle was making rounds early in the morning and reported seeing a black triangle going over the facility.  i told my wife that i saw the same object when i was taking my break from painting.

we lived four blocks from the prison complex, with the michigan state ploice post # 43 across the street from prison grounds.

i went to work the next night and no one wanted to talked about it. so i kept my experience to myself.

the black ufo moved westerly at treetop level, and i lost view of it as the trees block my line of sight.
content.summary: Sitting on my back steps-0200 hrs-facing south-clear sky-no moonlight-felt a presence-stood up facing north-observed black triangl object moving east to west at treetop level steady and slow-no sound or lights

content.detailedDescription: i saw a diformed rainbow in a cemtrail. an took a snapshot from a stoplight in my car (window rolled down) later i looked at the photo an noticed a object along with 2 birds. i was stunned! i have had other experiences in the past ( possible abduction and implant) an now i have captured something on camera but i am still doubtful of what it may be. so i would like to share the photo with mufon an see if its a ufo...
content.summary: Took picture of rainbow in cemtrail, didn't notice ufo untill looking at photo. birds in photo ufo to the right of birds..

content.detailedDescription:
August 15, 2011. about 9:10 pm.

chicago illinois, east villiage neighborhood. where evergreen street meets the freeway, before rounding up, becoming ada steet, and across evergreen from the iconic st. stanislaus church, west side of the freeway and the morton's salt plant.

a bit of back story:

before i begin, i must point out that i've seen planes, helicopters, birds, balloons, and satellites before, and this object wasn't any of those things. i saw this thing four years ago, but still remember it vividly.

i was home alone in my apartment, neither of my roommates at the time were home.

i went out to have a cigarette around 9:05 pm. i had just returned, the day before, from my parent's home in north central indiana. the stars are obviously much more visible at my folk's home without all the light pollution from the chicago metropolitan area. i spotted many satellites when i was at my parent's house and wondered if i could see any in her city since only a handful of stars can cut through the light pollution. sure enough, after prolonged sky gazing, i spotted a satellite moving across the sky.

the sighting:

as i was staring at the sky (facing east) eventually i noticed an object moving from east to west. i was able to watch the object for at least two minutes before buildings blocked my view.

the first thing i noticed was its slow and deliberate movement. the trajectory of the object would eventually take it almost directly overhead as it continued to move west in a deliberate straight line. the object was very high in the sky, but i can't even begin to guess its actual altitude.

the object was pale white, so pale that one would not notice it at a glance. i watched it as it continued moving west.

as the object moved closer to being overhead, more features emerged. first i noticed a very faint blue illuminous halo surrounding the object. very faint, again the object would not be noticeable on a glance. then i noticed the the objects pale white core was - it's hard to describe - squiggly in motion. this squiggly motion was a trait of the object's core and not a trait of its flight trajectory, which as i've stated before, was a straight line moving east to west.

next i noticed very faint blue illuminous beams periodically emitting from the object's underside, more on that soon.

the next feature i noticed were particles dropping from the object's underside, independent of the faint blue beams. these particles were the same illuminous faint blue color as the halo and beams. the particles descended and disappeared very quickly, like the last trails of fireworks descending before quickly disappearing, but did not leave a "smoke trail" like fireworks.

as this was happening the object was practically directly overhead and it was still emitting the beams.  one of the beams crossed my eye and actually created a glare in my eye, like a traditional light beam - like from a flashlight. only it was, of course, much dimmer.

to my right i noticed flickering, as if the light beam struck the earth not 20 feet away from me. i got very anxious and actually crouched down, pressing my back against the closed door of my apartment.

the object kept moving west. it crossed over the top of my apartment building. i ran up to the street (evergreen) and watched it continue west for a few moments. it was completely silent.

i wish i had binoculars so i could get a clear and close view of the object, but alas i did not.

my roommates weren't home to witness this strange object and i googled searched for weeks after hoping to find other sightings from that night to corroborate mine, but i didn't find anything.
content.summary: White pulsating core. very faint blue halo. very faint blue beam. also appeared to eject or jettison particles, also very faint blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from a classic car show in spokane washington in my 1967 mustang.  it was about 8:30 at night i had just passed plummer idaho heading south on highway 95 when off to my right i noticed a long cigar shaped object hovering in the air it had three blue lights at each end.  i slowed down and was about to pull over to get a better look at what i was seeing when it appears to move toward me.  i speed up and the object then speeds up as well i slow down. it does the same.  always remaining parallel with me.  i then accelerated to about 125mph it was still there then a few seconds later it accelerated away from me on a westward heading at very high speed.  i then slowed back to speed limit.  the unsettling part of this encounter is that it's about 1 1/2 hour drive from spokane washington to my house in moscow idaho.  i left spokane at 7 pm and clearly do not remember stopping at any point on the highway but it was 1:30 am when i got home.  so there is a approximately 4 hour gap of time i cannot account for.
content.summary: Was cigar snapped object with two blue lights at each end.  dark body no visible windows.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a very difficult story for me to talk about, ive kept it hidden since 1988.
it was a 2 week long event in june of 1988 that started out with me waking up around 1am to go into my kitchen and stare out the window at a certain spot in the sky, i would see a light but i was unsure if it was a star or something else.
i knew what i was doing there at the window but would not consciencely admit it to myself( its difficult to explain)almost as tho i knew what was coming and what i was looking for.
this 2 week event is too long and too involved to type the whole thing out here,but it involved abduction, my physically seeing the ship, physically seeing 2 entities in my apartment twice and also a hooded figure that appeared at the foot of my bed and did something to the bottom of my foot that was very painful.
during this 2 week time i contacted yvonne smith, she and also bud hopkins worked with me to help me thru this 2 week period. i also called yvonne in panic the 2nd time the entities were in my apartment.
also the morning after the abduction i woke up with a bruise the size of a huge dinner plate on my stomach.( dont know if this makes sense but after the abduction i was returned to my bed and i immediately knew something had happened to me.) its just too hard to explain the details here.
began having dreams about what was done to me during the abduction and also about the things they showed me.
bud hopkins wanted to make this more public, get it out there but i refused, i was too afraid and ive been too afraid all these years to talk about those 2 weeks, im almost 60 years old now and i want to finally make what happened to me known, its time.
also i believe there was a  connection to rocketdyne which was just a few blocks away from my apt. if i can talk with someone i can tell them why i think that.
yvonne wanted to use hypnosis on me to get more details but i was too afraid to know more( i think i was afraid they would come back.)
please, i just want to get this story out, maybe telling it will help me in some way and possibly help someone else. ive lived with this a long, long time and it changed how i see the world and my life, it changed me as a person.
content.summary: Week long event that took place inside and outside my apartment, was in contact with yvonne smith and bud hopkins during that week and called yvonne smith at home while entities were in my apartment with me and she stayed on the phone with me to help me.

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a carpenter during the construction of the taft prison in california in 1990. one morning, as i was driving westbound to work on hwy 119, i noticed a bright light that seemed out of place hovering over the horizon. i didn't think much about it until something strange happened. a circle formed around the light (ufo) and, within the circle, the sky lit up like it was day time, but this was about 30-45 minutes before sunrise. the entire sky was dark except for this ufo and the small circle that formed around it. i pulled off to the side of the road to get out of my car and take a closer look; i noticed 5-6 other drivers doing the same. after 5-10 minutes, the ufo slowly descended to the bottom of the circle (force field) that surrounded it. the ufo didn't just pass through the bottom of this force field, it looked as if it pierced the circle (force field) actually pulling it down into a point before it seemingly "broke through" and flew off southbound towards los angeles. once the sun finally came up, as i arrived to work, i noticed strange squiggly lines in the sky. i checked the newspaper and watched the evening news over the next few days to see if there were any explanations for this strange encounter, but i found none. i've never seen anything like it before or since.
content.summary: I witnessed a ufo hovering in the sky. it seemed to create a force field around itself. it then pierced the force field and flew off in the direction of los angeles.
